title: Definitions
context: §457G-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Foreign-trained person&rdquo; means a person who has completed an educational program or course of study in occupational therapy in an institution located outside the United States. &ldquo;Occupational therapist&rdquo; means a person who engages in the practice of occupational therapy in this State. &ldquo;Occupational therapy assistant&rdquo; means a person who engages in the practice of occupational therapy under the supervision of and in partnership with an occupational therapist. [L 2001, c 198, pt of §1; am L 2003, c 97, §5; am L 2014, c 209, §3] Note Former §457G-1 renumbered as §457G-1.5.
